scripts.build: npm install ; webpack --config ./src/client/webpack.config.js ; tsc -p ./src/server/tsconfig.server.json ; docker build --tag node-docker -f ./scripts/Prod.Dockerfile ./
scripts.dev: npm install ; tsc -p ./src/server/tsconfig.server.json; docker build --tag dev-node-docker -f ./scripts/Dev.Dockerfile ./ ; docker-compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up -d ; concurrently -k "tsc -p ./src/server/tsconfig.server.json -w" "webpack --config ./src/client/webpack.config.js --watch"
